Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService")
TrainedBatTheifModel = InsertService:LoadAsset(180247488) TrainedBatTheif = TrainedBatTheifModel:GetChildren()[1]:Clone() if TrainedBatTheifModel and TrainedBatTheifModel.Parent then TrainedBatTheifModel:Destroy() end
DisplayModel = Tool:FindFirstChild("DisplayModel") if DisplayModel then DisplayModel:Destroy() end
BatManagement = script:WaitForChild("BatManagement")
MaxEnemyDistance = 100
Gravity = 196.20
ReloadTime = 5
Active = false BatTarget = nil ToolTaken = false
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
Handle.Transparency = 0
Tool.Enabled = true
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if player == Player and CheckIfAlive() then if Mode == "MouseClick" and Value.Down then if not BatTheif or not BatTheif.Parent and Tool.Enabled then Handle.Transparency = 1 SpawnBatTheif() elseif Value.Target and Value.Target.Parent then local character = Value.Target.Parent if character:IsA("Hat") or character:IsA("Tool") then character = character.Parent end if character then local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local torso = character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and torso and (torso.Position - Torso.Position).magnitude <= MaxEnemyDistance then local ToolsFound = {} --Supports multiple tools equipped theft for i, v in pairs(character:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Tool") and v:FindFirstChild("Handle") then table.insert(ToolsFound, v) end end if #ToolsFound > 0 then local ToolSelected = ToolsFound[math.random(1, #ToolsFound)] BatTarget = ToolSelected end end end end end end end)
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ReturnValue = nil pcall(function() ReturnValue = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ReturnValue end
function Reload(Destroy) if not Active then return end BatTarget = nil ToolTaken = false if Destroy then Active = false if BatTheif and BatTheif.Parent then BatTheif:Destroy() end for i, v in pairs({BatDied, BatDestroyed}) do if v then v:disconnect() end end Handle.Transparency = 0 end if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end
function GetTotalMass(Parent) local Mass = 0 local function GetMass(Parent) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then Mass = (Mass + v:GetMass()) end GetMass(v) end end GetMass(Parent) return Mass end
function CreateBatTheif() local BatTheif = TrainedBatTheif:Clone() local BatManagementClone = BatManagement:Clone() local CreatorValue = Instance.new("ObjectValue") CreatorValue.Name = "Creator" CreatorValue.Value = Player CreatorValue.Parent = BatManagementClone local ToolValue = Instance.new("ObjectValue") ToolValue.Name = "Tool" ToolValue.Value = Tool ToolValue.Parent = BatManagementClone BatManagementClone.Disabled = false BatManagementClone.Parent = BatTheif local BatHumanoid = BatTheif:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local BatTorso = BatTheif:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not BatHumanoid or BatHumanoid.Health == 0 or not BatTorso then return end local BodyPosition = Instance.new("BodyPosition") BodyPosition.Parent = BatTorso local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge) BodyGyro.Parent = BatTorso return BatTheif end
function SpawnBatTheif() BatTheif = CreateBatTheif() local BatHumanoid = BatTheif:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local BatTorso = BatTheif:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not BatHumanoid or BatHumanoid.Health == 0 or not BatTorso then return end local BodyPosition = BatTorso:FindFirstChild("BodyPosition") local BodyGyro = BatTorso:FindFirstChild("BodyGyro") if not BodyPosition or not BodyGyro then return end Active = true BatDied = BatHumanoid.Died:connect(function() Debris:AddItem(BatTheif, 2) end) BatDestroyed = BatTheif.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not BatTheif.Parent then Reload(true) end end) for i, v in pairs(BatTheif:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then v.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent then return end local character = Hit.Parent if character:IsA("Hat") or character:IsA("Tool") then character = character.Parent end local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and BatTarget and BatTarget.Parent == character then BatTarget.Parent = nil ToolTaken = true end end) end end Spawn(function() while CheckIfAlive() and BatTheif.Parent and BatHumanoid.Parent and BatHumanoid.Health > 0 and BatTorso.Parent and BodyPosition.Parent and BodyGyro.Parent do if not BatTarget or not BatTarget.Parent then if (BatTorso.Position - Torso.Position).magnitude <= 8 and BatTarget and ToolTaken then local Backpack = Player:FindFirstChild("Backpack") if Backpack then BatTarget.Parent = Backpack end Spawn(function() Reload(false) end) end BodyGyro.cframe = ((ToolTaken and CFrame.new(BatTorso.Position, Torso.Position)) or Torso.CFrame) local Mass = ((GetTotalMass(BatTheif) * Gravity) * 100) if (BatTarget and BatTarget.Parent) or ToolTaken then Mass = ((GetTotalMass(BatTheif) * Gravity) * 1.05) end BodyPosition.maxForce = Vector3.new(Mass, Mass, Mass) local Position = (Torso.CFrame + Torso.CFrame.lookVector * -(Torso.Size.Z * 1.5)) Position = (Position + (Position * CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0)).lookVector * (BatTorso.Size.X * 0.5)).p Position = (Position + Vector3.new(0, 5, 0)) if BatTarget and ToolTaken then local Direction = CFrame.new(BatTorso.Position, Position) BodyPosition.position = (BatTorso.CFrame + Direction.lookVector * 5).p else BodyPosition.position = Position end else local ModelCheck = Instance.new("Model") local TargetClone = BatTarget:Clone() TargetClone.Parent = ModelCheck local TargetSize = ModelCheck:GetModelSize() local TargetCFrame = ModelCheck:GetModelCFrame() local Position = TargetCFrame + Vector3.new(0, ((TargetSize.Y / 2) + (BatTheif:GetModelSize().Y / 2)), 0) local Direction = CFrame.new(BatTorso.Position, Position.p) BodyGyro.cframe = Direction BodyPosition.position = (BatTorso.CFrame + Direction.lookVector * 5).p end wait(0.1) end end) BatTheif.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") BatTorso.CFrame = Torso.CFrame + Torso.CFrame.lookVector * (Torso.Size.Z * 2) + Vector3.new(0, 6, 0) end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Character and Character.Parent and Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso and Torso.Parent) end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end Handle.Transparency = 0 end
function Unequipped() Player = nil Reload(true) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Model = script.Parent
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Creator = script:FindFirstChild("Creator") Tool = script:FindFirstChild("Tool")
FixCamera = script:FindFirstChild("FixCamera")
function DestroyModel() if Player and Player.Parent then if FixCamera then if Character and Character.Parent then local FixCameraClone = FixCamera:Clone() FixCameraClone.Disabled = false FixCameraClone.Parent = Character end local Backpack = Player:FindFirstChild("Backpack") if Backpack then local FixCameraClone = FixCamera:Clone() FixCameraClone.Disabled = false FixCameraClone.Parent = Backpack end end end Debris:AddItem(Model, 2) end
if not Creator or not Creator.Value or not Creator.Value.Parent or not Tool or not Tool.Value or not Tool.Value.Parent then DestroyModel() return end
ToolObject = Tool.Value Player = Creator.Value
if not Player or not Player:IsA("Player") then DestroyModel() return end
Character = Player.Character if not Character or not Character.Parent then DestroyModel() return end
Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then DestroyModel() return end
Humanoid.Died:connect(function() DestroyModel() end)
Player.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Character" then DestroyModel() end end)
ToolObject.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not ToolObject.Parent then DestroyModel() end end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
pcall(function() Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera Camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom end)
Debris:AddItem(script, 2)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if player == Player and CheckIfAlive() then end end)
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) local ReturnValue = nil pcall(function() ReturnValue = ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) end) return ReturnValue end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Character and Character.Parent and Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = true, Target = Mouse.Target}) end) end
function Unequipped() end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
